question:
A resturant near your house is making a lot of noise. You called the manger but no action was taken. Write a letter to the manager. In your letter:
*Introduce yourself
*Describe the problems you are facing because of this
*suggest solutions
text: I am writing to you to complain about the noise which is coming to my home from the restaurant.
I am a permanent resident of this community and living here with my family since 2005. I am pursuing my post-graduation through distance learning due to which I spent my whole day on studies.

However, my house is adjoined to the restaurant and it plays loud music because of which I am unable to concentrate on my work. Besides music, the staff also create noise in other forms which distracts me a lot that I could not focus on my goals.

Even I called the manager to express the problem yet no actions were taken by him. Therefore, It would be really appreciable if you could please ask the staff to reduce the volume of music and their daily tasks so that it will not  bother others.
Hope to get a positive response from your side.
